resources.string: Please grant the required permissions in order to continue with the identification.
In order to continue with the identification you need to grant the required permissions. The process was aborted.
The following permissions are necessary to continue with the identification: \n
.\nPlease confirm the permissions in order to use this function.
Please grant the required permissions in order to continue with the photo identification: \n
Temporarily save photos on your mobile device
The camera flash couldn\'t be activated.
Please wait while you are being connected with one of our Identification Experts. This can take up to two minutes.
Please look into the camera and state your first names and surname in full.
Please hold the front side of your identity document into the camera, so we can read the details.
Please tilt your document up and down, so we can see it\'s security features.
Please read out loud the number of your identity document. You\'ll find it on the front in the top right corner.
Please hold the back side of your identity document into the camera, so we can read the details.
Thank you for using our online identification service!
All our Identification Experts are busy due to high demand. This will result in longer waiting times than usual. The identification service is available Monday to Sunday from 8 a.m. to 12 a.m.
An Internet Connection is required for the identification. Please connect to your mobile device to the internet and try again.
An unexpected error occurred. The connection is being shut down.
An error occurred while trying to access your camera. Please try again later.
Do you really want to cancel the identification?
The Ident-Code is incorrect. Please re-enter your Ident-Code.
Your transaction number is not correct. Please check and try again.
Your version of this app is outdated. Please update your app to the latest version in the app store and try again.
The identification for this transaction number has already been completed and cannot be restarted
Unfortunately an internal error has occurred. Please contact our support under support@mail.idnow.de and state the following error number: #exceptionID
IDnow is currently under maintenance and will be available again soon. Please be patient and come back in a few minutes.
We advice you to use a WiFi connection for the video identification.
Identification failed. Please check your internet connection and try again.
Your request for an Ident-Code to be sent to your mobile phone failed. Please try again.
The Ident-Code is incorrect. Please re-enter your Ident-Code.
Identification failed. A problem has occurred with the video connection. Please try again.

You are calling the Video-Ident Service outside our opening hours.

You can start your identification during the following times. An appointment is not necessary.

Our Opening Hours:
\nPlease restart your identification during our opening hours.
Please enter and confirm your transaction number to start the identification.
Please have your identity document readily available.
Enter your transaction number above and start the identification.
Follow the instructions that will guide you through the identification.
Your identification will be completed in a matter of minutes.
In order to start the identification, the following is required:
We will send you an Ident-Code to this mobile number by SMS during the identification.
Your identity document will be checked during the identification, so please have it ready and at hand.
By starting the Identification, you agree to the making of the following: images of yourself, your identity document and a sound recording of the conversation.
I agree to the IDnow Terms of Service and have read the Privacy Policy.
What is my data used for?
Your Ident-Code has been sent to the following phone number by SMS: xxx. Please enter and confirm your Ident-Code to continue.
Didn\'t receive an Ident-Code or entered a wrong number?
Please check your mobile number and request your Ident-Code by SMS.
Please wait while our Identification Expert checks your data. You will be put through automatically.

You need a valid identity card or passport for IDnow Online-Ident.\nWe support a wide range of modern identity documents with security holograms. In particular identity cards and passports from the European Union, Turkey, Norway, Switzerland, Iceland and the USA.

You need a valid identity card or passport for IDnow Online-Ident.\nWe support a wide range of modern identity documents with security holograms. In particular identity cards and passports from the European Union, Turkey, Norway, Switzerland, Iceland and the USA.
Your identification couldn\'t be completed.\n\nPlease use an alternative method to identify yourself or try again.
Thank you for using our online identification service! You can now close the app und will be informed about the next steps.
Choose the country that issued your identity document.
Choose your type of identity document.
Please make all the photos listed below before submitting your data.
By tapping the button, you accept that the images will be transmitted and stored.
Your data has been encrypted and is being transferred to our secure servers.
Place your face in the green outline and take a picture (selfie).

Photo requirements:

• Your face is clearly visible
• Photo not covered by fingers or objects
Place your ID card on a neutral surface. Align the document\'s front side within the green frame. Take a picture.

Photo requirements:

• Front side fully visible
• Photo not covered by fingers or object
• Clear photo and sharp letters
Place your ID card on a neutral surface. Align the document\'s back side within the green frame. Take a picture.

Photo requirements:

• Back side fully visible
• Photo not covered by fingers or objects
• Clear photo and sharp letters
Hold the ID card in your hand and tilt it, so that the holograms become clearly visible. Use the flash if needed. Take a picture.

Photo requirements:

• ID card fully visible
• Holograms clearly visible
Place your driving license on a neutral surface. Align the document\'s front side within the green frame. Take a picture.

Photo requirements:

• Front side fully visible
• Photo not covered by fingers or objects
• Clear photo and sharp letters
Place your driving license on a neutral surface. Align the document\'s back side within the green frame. Take a picture.

Photo requirements:

• Back side fully visible
• Photo not covered by fingers or objects
• Clear photo and sharp letters
Hold the driving license in your hand and tilt it, so that the holograms become clearly visible. Use the flash if needed. Take a picture.

Photo requirements:

• Driving license fully visible
• Holograms clearly visible
Place your passport on a neutral surface. Align the passport\'s photo page within the green frame. Take a picture.

Photo requirements:

• Photo page fully visible
• Photo not covered by fingers or objects
• Clear photo and sharp letters
Place your passport on a neutral surface. Align the passport\'s second page within the green frame. Take a picture.

Photo requirements:

• Second page fully visible
• Photo not covered by fingers or objects
• Clear photo and sharp letters
Hold the passport\'s photo page in your hand and tilt it, so that the holograms become clearly visible. Use the flash if needed. Take a picture.

Photo requirements:

• Photo page fully visible
• Holograms clearly visible
Place your residence permit on a neutral surface. Align the document\'s front side within the green frame. Take a picture.

Photo requirements:

• Front side fully visible
• Photo not covered by fingers or objects
• Clear photo and sharp letters
Place your residence permit on a neutral surface. Align the document\'s back side within the green frame. Take a picture.

Photo requirements:

• Back side fully visible
• Photo not covered by fingers or objects
• Clear photo and sharp letters
Hold the residence permit in your hand and tilt it, so that the holograms become clearly visible. Use the flash if needed. Take a picture.

Photo requirements:

• Residence permit fully visible
• Holograms clearly visible
Do you really want to start over?
Please draw your signature in the field above and tap the button to proceed.
The Android version used by your mobile device seems to be incompatible with our PDF Viewer. This might result in an empty page being displayed during the identification instead of your pdf document.
